The Indigo Children are being prepared now to run RRTs in order to disengage the Nibiruian Diodic Crystal Grid through which pole shift can be forced and to seal Earth’s portal system from planned Fallen Angelic 2003-2004 invasion. Before 2003, Emerald Cov- enant races will know if the RRTs are successful and if fulfillment of the Atlantian Conspiracy can be prevented. If not, preparations are al- ready underway to assist Humans in DNA Template Activation so some may become biologically capable of portal evacuation. Sometimes truth is stranger than Fiction. 327
